description: The image presents a cartoon-style portrayal of a young woman dressed as a nun, her expression conveying deep distress. She has fair skin, blonde curled hair peeking from under a white wimple and a dark purple habit. A single, large teardrop streams down her left cheek from her large, blue eyes, which gaze upward with a pleading expression. Her lips are downturned in a pout. Around her neck, she wears a thin gold chain with a small cross pendant. Her fingers are long and painted with black nail polish, clutching a pink handkerchief with white polka dots. A small white cross adorns the sleeve of her habit.
